content.html:
I was able to move the box without this change. It's just that it takes 1000 seconds to get there.

This helps to speed things up:

diff -r 5254a5d2bff7 examples/plugins/animate_pose/animate_pose.cc
--- a/examples/plugins/animate_pose/animate_pose.cc Fri Jul 17 11:54:34 2015 -0700
+++ b/examples/plugins/animate_pose/animate_pose.cc Fri Jul 17 17:58:41 2015 -0700
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@
     public: void Load(physics::ModelPtr _parent, sdf::ElementPtr /*_sdf*/)
     {
       gazebo::common::PoseAnimationPtr anim(
-          new gazebo::common::PoseAnimation("test", 1000.0, true));
+          new gazebo::common::PoseAnimation("test", 10.0, true));

       gazebo::common::PoseKeyFrame *key;

@@ -38,7 +38,7 @@
       key->Translation(ignition::math::Vector3d(0, 0, 0));
       key->Rotation(ignition::math::Quaterniond(0, 0, 0));

-      key = anim->CreateKeyFrame(1000.0);
+      key = anim->CreateKeyFrame(10.0);
       key->Translation(ignition::math::Vector3d(5, 0, 0));
       key->Rotation(ignition::math::Quaterniond(0, 0, 1.5707));
